name: Custom Sans Attack: Blast From the Past!
name_original: Custom Sans Attack: Blast From the Past!
description:
A Custom attack to simulate the Sans fight from the hit 2015 indie RPG Undertale by Toby Fox. 

Use arrow keys to dodge the Gaster Blasters.

Music and images credit to Toby Fox.

Game created using Scratch.

Check me out: https://scratch.mit.edu/users/gogojediman/

Have fun!

-@notahumans_official
